nodes.text: Bargwill Tomder was a male Cloddogran with brown skin and hair. Tomder wore a red shirt with a vest over it and a brown hat.

A Cloddogran groom, Bargwill Tomder ruled the fathier stables of at the Canto Bight racetrack with an iron fist. He was ill-tempered, and his default approach to solving problems was simply to crack his whip.
Bargwill Tomder was created for the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. The character was first revealed through the Star Wars: Card Trader app.
